description: PM Mette Frederiksen apologises for going ahead with the mass cull of mink without new legislation.
title: Denmark mink cull: Government admits culling had no legal basis
title_page: Denmark mink cull: Government admits culling had no legal basis - BBC News
maintext: "Even if we were in a rush, it should have been completely clear to us that new legislation was required, and it was not. I apologise for that," PM Mette Frederiksen told parliament on Tuesday.
